abstract: Novartis is in talks to buy parts of its Irish peer Elan, including its multiple sclerosis products and its Alzheimer’s disease drug pipeline, The Sunday Times reported.
snippet: Novartis is in talks to buy parts of its Irish peer Elan, including its multiple sclerosis products and its Alzheimer’s disease drug pipeline, The Sunday Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Swiss drugmaker Novartis is in talks to buy parts of Irish peer Elan, including its flagship multiple sclerosis products and its Alzheimer’s disease pipeline, The Sunday Times reported.

headline.main: Novartis in Talks for Parts of Elan, Report Says
